name: The Walking Dead: Episode 2 - Starved for Help
name_original: The Walking Dead: Episode 2 - Starved for Help
description:
The Walking Dead: Episode 2 - Starved for Help is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 29-06-2012. Telltale Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Walking Dead: Episode 2 - Starved for Help on PC, PlayStation 3 and Android.
